body.name: Mini Steam Iron for Clothes, 1100W Portable Steamer Travel Mini Steam Iron, Iron Steamer Support Dry and Wet Ironing 2 in 1 Fast Heat-Up for Home Travel College (Beige)

features: 【Quick Ironing】--If you are in a hurry and urgently need to iron clothes, the mini iron has a powerful 1100W heating element that can be quickly heated within 15-30 seconds to quickly iron suits, shirts, skirts, etc. for emergency and daily use.

【Wet and Dry Ironing】--Travel mini steam iron with titanium work surface panel, large contact area, dry ironing can be easily ironed to remove wrinkles; evenly distributed axial arrangement of steam holes, a key to get continuous and strong steam, and wet ironing speed, quickly ironing deep wrinkles.
【Easy to Carry】--Steamer iron for clothes is small, very space-saving, can be carried around, can easily put into luggage and backpack, convenient to carry anywhere.
【Convenient and Efficient】--The mini steamer iron unique oval design makes it easy to iron buttons, lapels and any hard-to-reach areas.
【Convenient Features】--Our mini steamer comes with a 1.5m power cord and also includes a water cup accessory for easy water supply and steam ironing.

【ATTENTION】: 1. Preheat must be completely: After plugging in the power, I recommend waiting at least 15-30 seconds to preheat before pressing the steam button, because the water needs to reach a certain temperature to become steam, if you press the steam button in advance, the water has not reached the steam temperature, the high temperature pressure in the tank will squeeze out the water without atomization, which is the cause of most leaks.

【ATTENTION】: 2. When using, avoid turning the product completely upside down. After use, pour out the excess water in the tank to avoid leakage from the water inlet when the product is inverted or stored.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Preheat for at least 20s before turning on the steam button, otherwise water will spray! NOTICE: <1>. There is only 1 steam setting, the amount of steam cannot be adjusted, if you want to iron woven fabrics, you can lay a piece of cloth on top of the ironed clothes before ironing.<2>. If there is "White Powder" falling out during use, it is a normal phenomenon, it is to protect the iron from overheating, and it will not appear again if you use it a few more times.<3>. Preheat must be completely: After plugging in the power, I recommend waiting at least 20s to preheat before pressing the steam button, because the water needs to reach a certain temperature to become steam, if you press the steam button in advance, the water has not reached the steam temperature, the high temperature pressure in the tank will squeeze out the water without atomization, which is the cause of most leaks.<4>. When using, avoid turning the product completely upside down. After use, pour out the excess water in the tank to avoid leakage from the water inlet when the product is inverted or stored.<5>. If you are traveling to Europe or other countries, please use a plug with voltage conversion, the adapter without voltage conversion function will cause damage to the steam iron.

Sharp curved design 360-degree all-around ironing allows flexible ironing of narrow areas such as buttons, lapels, and collars, allowing details to be shown elegantly. Comes with a filling cup The travel clothes steamer is designed with a 75ml integrated water tank, which is easy to fill with water cups to prevent spills. Family travel essential The handheld mini steam iron has a compact design, is small and lightweight, and easy to store, making it perfect for home and travel use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This heats up fast and does work nicely, but runs out kinda fast

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this little steamer. I've tried a few, this is the best one. It can be an iron and or a steamer. The stream is good. I bought 3 for my traveling fam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works so well!
reviews.reviewText: This handheld steamer is great! Wow! Things that were wrinkled now look super ironed and lovely. 1 word of caution is this...if you fill the water intake super full, when you first start to steam your clothes, water also comes out from the holes besides steam and it is burning hot and if you are not careful, you can easily get burned. And its not just a few drops, but also not like a downpour either. So be cautious, but other than that, is a great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Heats up fast, easy to use, and presses item to a crisp look, would buy one as a gift

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars DON'T USE ABROAD - EVEN WITH CONVERTER
reviews.reviewText: I brought this on my trip to Paris. Plugged it into the outlet converter and as soon as i turned it on it started sizzling, smoking and there was a horrible smell. Almost started on fire and had to be thrown out immediately. When I tried it at home in the US it was useful but I only used it once at home.

reviews.reviewText: There is no way to adjust the heat on this thing. It burns everything

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and Lightweight
reviews.reviewText: The mini steam iron is designed to be small and portable, making it easy to carry and store. I always travel with it and it's very convenient and useful.
"Nice and light for travelling, warns up really well. Havecused it already and works very well. Wire is short so I will need to. Take a extension cord. But pleased with it."

It's a rather nice travel iron, or just a smaller sized iron if you're looking for something more compact that doesn't take up a lot of space. The fact that it doubles as a steamer is convenient as those can get pretty big. However you are obviously not going to get the same performance out of it as you would a full-size steamer.Still it's handheld and relatively light. It has a nice design, and is comfortable to hold, which is important since you will also just be holding it up to steam potentially, and that could get tiring if it was too heavy. But it's a good weight, not too hard on your arms.It actually rather un-ambiguously works well as a normal iron. It's a smaller size, but it heats up quickly, and does the job.As a steamer, my experience was a little bit more mixed. It's water tank is obviously limited in size, that's unavoidable. But it does emit a decent amount of steam. The control scheme is a little odd and takes a bit getting used to. The pictures I included are of a shirt I steamed, and as you can see it didn't do a horrible job, but it didn't quite get it all the way either. The cord is also rather short, which is annoying for a handheld device you're going to be waving around while it's plugged in. It's great for touch-ups, but if you want to steam an entire piece of clothing, it's a little bit more challenging, and you won't get perfect results.Still I like this device, It does a decent job both as an iron and as a steamer especially considering it's small size. The unit also seems pretty robust, and it should last a long time.

reviews.reviewTitle: Compact and Convenient for On-the-Go Wrinkle-Free Style ✈️👚
reviews.reviewText: 👍 Pros:Compact and Travel-Friendly: The Mini Steam Iron has quickly become my go-to travel companion. Its compact size is perfect for packing in my suitcase or even a carry-on bag. Whether I'm on a business trip or heading to a college dorm, this iron easily fits into my travel plans.2-in-1 Versatility: One feature that I truly appreciate is its 2-in-1 functionality. It not only serves as a traditional dry iron but also offers the convenience of a steamer for quick touch-ups. This versatility means I can handle various clothing materials, from dress shirts to delicate fabrics, without any hassle.Fast Heat-Up: Time is of the essence, especially when I'm in a hurry. This mini steam iron heats up remarkably fast, so I can quickly de-wrinkle my clothes and be out the door in no time. It's a real time-saver for busy mornings or last-minute outfit adjustments.👎 Cons:Water Tank Size: While the compact size is a plus for portability, it does come with a smaller water tank. This means that it might require refilling more frequently, especially when using the steaming function. It's a minor inconvenience, but it's something to be aware of, particularly for longer ironing sessions.In conclusion, the Mini Steam Iron is a reliable companion for wrinkle-free clothing, whether at home, during travel, or at college. Its compact size and 2-in-1 functionality make it a valuable addition to my routine, even though the smaller water tank might require occasional refills. ✈️👚🏢🧳

reviews.reviewTitle: Worked once then just leaked water
reviews.reviewText: I took this with me to Europe. Tested it before leaving and it worked. Spit some water drops but worked. Once in Europe, it completely failed and just leaked water. I left it in Amsterdam as it was dead weight in my luggage.

This is a pretty small, lightweight steamer. Fits nicely in my suitcase for travel. It also fits nicely in the drawer in the bathroom for a quick touch up before work. Has a thicker handle which is great for my arthritic hands.
